pkgmetadata.longdescription: Report on Diversity and Inclusion in a Corporate Setting // Facilitate the analysis of teams in a corporate setting: assess the diversity per grade and job, present the results, search for bias (in hiring and/or promoting processes). It also provides methods to simulate the effect of bias, random team- data, etc. White paper: 'Philippe J.S. De Brouwer' (2021) http://www.de-brouwer.com/assets/div/div-white-paper.pdf. Book (chapter 36): 'Philippe J.S. De Brouwer' (2020, ISBN:978-1-119-63272-6) and 'Philippe J.S. De Brouwer' (2020) doi:10.1002/9781119632757.
